title: GAMEPLAY - Enemy flashed away from Demacian Justice.
body:
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=FcrRyYuBvFA

Lucian was able to flash away from an in progress Garen ultimate.

replies.body:
Game Rule: Targetted abilities gets cancelled during cast time if the target are no longer visible.

This is what seems to have happened, thus intended.

https://youtu.be/ikKHrl6n8zU

Here it is again this time with fog of war. I had sight of him the entire time.

http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/news/game-updates/patch/patch-418-notes#patch-bugfixes

> Garen's R - Demacian Justice will no longer cancel itself if the target enters the fog of war while Garen is mid-cast

Do you even know your own game?
Now the mod won't pass this along to the devs because you showed him up =*(

how can you escape justice ???? 

riot no caterino to criminals please
There is a ward in the bush, he still had vision.

doesnt look like it tbh. look closely. he didnt flash into the bush.

even if he did, garen had a ward in that bush there.

this bug has been happening for a long time. i encountered it too a couple of times, and its incredibly frustrating.
Lucian didn't leave vision the entire time, and even so Garen's ult cannot be canceled by entering fog of war during it's cast animation. The brushes work FOR Garen, not against him.
ye, they still didnt fix that. its been going on for what, a year now?
I dont know how it missed. Whenever I see Garen ult, even if the target did LB double dash away it would still hit as long as it was in its animation.
